AI Description: QIIME 2 is a powerful and extensible microbiome analysis platform that is free, open-source, and community-driven. It provides tools for microbial community analysis and interpretation from raw DNA sequencing data.
Core Features: Quality Control & Data Preprocessing, Microbial Diversity Analysis, Taxonomic Classification, Metagenomics & Functional Prediction, Interactive Visualizations, Machine Learning Workflows
General Tags: Microbiome Analysis, Bioinformatics, DNA Sequencing, Microbial Ecology
